metadata.title: CVE-2023-52479 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: ksmbd:fix uaf in smb20_oplock_break_ack drop reference after use opinfo.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-52479` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-5.15.0-94-generic - 5.15.0-94.104~20.04.1
linux-image-5.15.0-94-generic-lpae - 5.15.0-94.104~20.04.1
linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-94-generic - 5.15.0-94.104~20.04.1
linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-94-generic-64k - 5.15.0-94.104~20.04.1
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-1053-aws - 5.15.0-1053.58~20.04.1
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-1056-azure - 5.15.0-1056.64~20.04.1
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-1056-azure-fde - 5.15.0-1056.64~20.04.1.1
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-1051-gcp - 5.15.0-1051.59~20.04.1
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-1036-gkeop - 5.15.0-1036.42~20.04.1
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-1046-ibm - 5.15.0-1046.49~20.04.1
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-1048-intel-iotg - 5.15.0-1048.54~20.04.1
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-94-lowlatency - 5.15.0-94.104~20.04.1
linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-94-lowlatency-64k - 5.15.0-94.104~20.04.1
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-1051-oracle - 5.15.0-1051.57~20.04.1
No subscription required
